text: Pale Rider is a 1985 American western movie directed by Clint Eastwood (who also stars) and also starring Carrie Snodgress, Michael Moriarty, Chris Penn, Richard Kiel, Sydney Penny, Doug McGrath, Richard Dysart. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1985 movies Category:1980s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Clint Eastwood
title: Pale Rider
